title: Salmon and Beef Freezer Storage Guide

items.name: Raw salmon
items.details: Up to 2-3 months for best quality. Can stay safe up to 6 months if sealed airtight.

items.name: Cooked salmon
items.details: About 2-3 months frozen before flavor and texture start to degrade.

items.name: Raw beef steaks or roasts
items.details: Up to 6-12 months in the freezer.

items.name: Wrapping method
items.details: Wrap tightly in plastic or vacuum seal before freezing. Double wrapping (plastic + freezer bag) or vacuum sealing prevents freezer burn.

items.name: Thawing method
items.details: Thaw in the fridge overnight. Do not thaw at room temperature.

notes: Vacuum sealing provides the best protection against freezer burn and extends quality. Always label with the date before freezing.
